widget.title: TextField
widget.p: TextField component allows the editing of a single line of text. This field has a simple text value.

parameters.parameter: The text contained in this field.
The preferred width of the component is fixed (if 0) or calculated by the given value.
The specified boolean to indicate whether or not this textfield should be editable. A not editable field is focusable, and selectable.
End index of the selection, same as the caret position.
Gives notification (invokes the given method) that there was an insert into the text or a portion of the text has been removed.
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component

keys.key: Moves insertion point one character to the right
Moves insertion point one character to the left
Moves insertion point to beginning of next word
Moves insertion point to beginning of previous word
Moves insertion point to beginning of field
Moves insertion point to end of field
Cuts selected text into the clipboard
Copies selected text into the clipboard
